hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT DISTINCT p_a.accession FROM protein_accession p_a JOIN protein_group_has_protein p_g_h_p ON p_a.l_protein_id = p_g_h_p.l_protein_id WHERE p_g_h_p.l_protein_group_id = :proteinGroupId

SELECT p_g_h_p.protein_accession FROM peptide_has_protein_group p_h_p_g JOIN protein_group_has_protein p_g_h_p ON p_h_p_g.l_protein_group_id = p_g_h_p.l_protein_group_id WHERE p_h_p_g.l_peptide_id = :peptideId
